snippet.title: Don't Scream – Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description: Better stay quiet while playing the Unreal Engine 5-powered, '90s found-camcorder-footage horror game Don't Scream, as you try to make your way through Pinewood Forest. Time will only progress when you move, and the events are all dynamic, meaning you don't know what might make you scream next. If you've got the courage (and a microphone) to play, you can check it out on Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2497900/DONT_SCREAM
